title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the alias names.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the alias names should be used to represent the columns instead of the old names.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select the desired dataset.
3. Double click on the first column name.
4. Verify that the alias name is used instead of the original name in the expression builder.
